GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an article object selected by id

exampleResponse.author: Stan
exampleResponse.title: shooting hoops
exampleResponse.body: saturday I will be playing some ball

GET /api/articles/: article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments on the requested article

exampleResponse.body: Replacing the quiet elegance of the dark suit and tie with the casual indifference of these muted earth tones is a form of fashion suicide, but, uh, call me crazy — onyou it works.
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: allows an existing user to add a comment to an article
